1.feature replace ~/content to static.sample.com/content replace ~/scripts to static.sample.com/scripts replace *.css to *.min.cs repalce *.js to *.min.js 2.sample app.config/web.config

    </sectionGroup>
  </configSections>
  <applicationSettings>
    <BinbinCdnMvc.Settings>
      <setting name="UseMinCss" serializeAs="String">
        <value>True</value>
      </setting>
      <setting name="UseMinScript" serializeAs="String">
        <value>True</value>
      </setting>

      </setting>
